title: One Piece: Boss Luffy Appears Again
author: Filler Academy
description: Filler Academy reviews episodes 406 & 407, the Boss Luffy Historical Special two-parter set in an alternate Edo period Japan timeline. The podcast discusses the mikoshi race and the crew's encounter with Thriller LTD.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Focused only on these filler episodes
